Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exclusive product to you at a special introductory price of $10500. This is an opportunity to own a piece that is worth more than its face value, and I am confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
